positive_test_cases.question: What is the purpose of the study?
positive_test_cases.expected_answer: The purpose of the study was to gain insights on consumers' food-related perspectives including preferences and consumption patterns.

positive_test_cases.question: In what age range did consumers prefer cost-saving measures and what were these measures?
positive_test_cases.expected_answer: Consumers under 45 prefered cost-saving measures including store brands, bulk purchases, and changing outlets.

positive_test_cases.question: What is the relationship between food outlet choices and income levels?
positive_test_cases.expected_answer: At least one of: In 2018 the most popular outlets were supermarkets, supercenters and mass merchandisers; high-income families were more likely to shop at various outlets

positive_test_cases.question: What is the relationship between food and beverage purchase patterns and income levels?
positive_test_cases.expected_answer: At least one of: high-income families were more likely to purchase fruits and vegetables; low-income families were more likely to purchase dairy products; families with young children are more likely to consume energy drinks compared to families without children.

positive_test_cases.question: In which year were food at home expenditures closest to food away from home expenditures?
Based on the data, which age group might be least likely to buy store brand items in response to price increases?

negative_test_cases.question: Which age group made up the highest percentage of the sample that was studied?
What were consumers' most preferred nurtients?
negative_test_cases.expected_answer: At least one of: turmeric; folic acid; iron.

negative_test_cases.question: what relationship was found between education level and beverage characteristic perceptions?
negative_test_cases.expected_answer: Postgraduates were more likely to report sodium as the worst beverage characteristic compared to high school and college graduates.

negative_test_cases.question: what food-related perception was the same across all education levels?
negative_test_cases.expected_answer: Preference of fresh foods over packaged foods.

negative_test_cases.question: what age group showed the highest average agreement with the food statements?
What did the study conclude?
negative_test_cases.expected_answer: At least one of: Average 2018 weekly grocery expenditure was $285; the primary shoping outlets were warehouses and ethnic stores; all age groups deal with price changes the same; 2018 trends were different to 2017.
